# Ignore 'Spelling' configuration artefacts
(?:^|/)\.github/actions/spelling

# Files
\.gitignore$

# Ignore file named `expect.words.txt`
^\Qexpect\.words\.txt\E$

# Ignore directories named `tmp`
(?:^|/)tmp/

# Ignore all files in Bootcamp folder
(?:^|/)src/Bootcamp.*/
(?:^|/)Bootcamp.*/

# Ignore binary files
[^/]\.pdf$
[^/]\.png$
^\QBootcamp.QA/US 1 - Mind Map.png\E$
